changeSet.createView: SELECT ads.id AS ad_id , SUM(ad_stats.daily_views) AS total_views , v_ad_ctrs.ctr_percentage AS ctr_percentage , v_conversion_rate_by_ad.conversion_rate_percentage AS conversion_rate_percentage , v_total_ad_revenue.total_revenue AS total_revenue , v_average_customer_age_conversions.average_age AS average_customer_age , v_conversions_best_state.state AS best_state , v_conversions_worst_state.state AS worst_state FROM ads LEFT JOIN ad_stats ON ad_stats.id = ads.id LEFT JOIN v_ad_ctrs ON v_ad_ctrs.ad_id = ads.id LEFT JOIN v_conversion_rate_by_ad ON v_conversion_rate_by_ad.ad_id = ads.id LEFT JOIN v_average_customer_age_conversions ON v_average_customer_age_conversions.ad_id = ads.id LEFT JOIN v_total_ad_revenue ON v_total_ad_revenue.ad_id = ads.id LEFT JOIN v_conversions_best_state ON v_conversions_best_state.ad_id = ads.id LEFT JOIN v_conversions_worst_state ON v_conversions_worst_state.ad_id = ads.id GROUP BY ads.id
